CRefCount
CDepthOfFieldFilter

Defines an image filter for performing depth of field

Image Filter Parameters
"MinStrength"  : float

Strength of blur at min distance

"MaxStrength"  : float

Strength of blur at max distance

"MinDistance"  : float

Minimum distance where blur starts

"DepthImage"  : IImage

depth image
